sense.gloss: to stick out too much, to protrude too far, to be too strong (e.g. of tea)
to be too forward, to be too assertive, to be pushy, to be obtrusive

sdata.j: これは↑派手↑↓は|で↓すぎる|。
このズボンは↑私↑↓わたし↓には↑派手↑↓は|で↓すぎる|わ。
sdata.e: These pants are too fancy for me.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちが↑環境↑↓かんきょう↓↑面↑↓めん↓の↑問題↑↓もんだい↓を↑耳↑↓みみ↓にしない|で↑過↑↓す↓ぎる|↑日↑↓ひ↓は１↑日↑↓にち↓とてない。
sdata.e: Not a day goes by without our hearing of an environmental problem.
